titleStmt.title: Cato translated grammatically directing for vnderstanding, construing, parsing, making, and proouing the same Latine: and so for continuall practice of the grammaticall analysis and genesis. Done for the good of schooles, and of all desirous to recouer, or keep that which they got in the grammar-schoole, or to increase therein.
Catonis disticha. Selections. English.
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, fl. 1581-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: J.B. (i.e. John Brinsley, translator).
Has I, with notes and alternate versions.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
